backend/main.mo: Main Motoko backend actor defining all data types (UserProfile, FocusBlock, Meeting, Activity, etc.) and CRUD functions for user profiles, activities, focus blocks, stress check-ins, meetings, and predictions using Map-based state storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (onboarding flow, calendar integration, focus mode, smart focus blocks, sleep mode, diet plan, insights, privacy) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, data files, and configuration with descriptions of their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with warm color palette (orange, beige, yellow, green) and base styling for body and borders.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script import for the React application titled 'FocusShield+SleepReset'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for dashboard, onboarding, focus, sleep, diet, insights, and privacy pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider with notification permission request and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Layout/AppLayout: Main layout component with sticky header, responsive navigation (desktop/mobile), authentication controls using Internet Identity, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution and social media links.
frontend/src/data/dietSuggestions.ts: Exports structured meal suggestions (breakfast, lunch, dinner, lightDinner) for vegetarian and non-vegetarian diets, each with name, description, and ingredients.
frontend/src/data/wellnessScripts.ts: Exports guided wellness exercise scripts organized by category (breathing, eyeRelaxation, neckStretch, mindfulness), each with id, title, duration, and step-by-step instructions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data (profile, activities, focus blocks, meetings, stress check-ins) via the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm, calming color palette for light and dark modes, plus base typography and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying user welcome, stress check-in prompts, meeting load metrics, focus blocks used, and quick action cards for focus mode, diet plan, and insights. Redirects to onboarding if no profile exists.
frontend/src/pages/DietPlanPage.tsx: Diet plan page that generates personalized meal suggestions (breakfast, lunch, dinner) based on user's vegetarian/non-vegetarian preference and light dinner toggle, with medical disclaimer and refresh functionality.
frontend/src/pages/FocusModePage.tsx: Focus mode page providing guided wellness activities (breathing, eye relaxation, neck stretches, mindfulness) with play/pause controls and functionality to schedule focus blocks with suggested durations.
frontend/src/pages/InsightsPage.tsx: Weekly insights page displaying summary statistics (meeting load, stress level, focus blocks) and pattern-based recommendations for improving work-life balance, stress management, and sleep quality.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Multi-step onboarding flow collecting user preferences including sleep/wake times, work hours, meeting load, caffeine habits, diet preference, and wellness goals to create initial user profile.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Privacy policy page displaying four privacy principles (local-first storage, no employer sharing, meeting privacy, full transparency) with icons and a privacy controls section featuring a cloud sync toggle switch.
frontend/src/pages/SleepModePage.tsx: Sleep mode page that displays user's sleep schedule from profile preferences and provides wind-down routine configuration with toggles for screens-off, meditation, and journaling reminders one hour before bedtime.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palette using OKLCH color space (including warmOrange, warmBeige, softYellow, mutedGreen), extended theme with custom shadows, fonts (Inter, Poppins), and animation keyframes for UI components.
project_state.json: Project state document describing FocusShield+SleepReset app architecture with calendar integration, meeting load scoring, micro-breaks, focus blocks, wind-down routines, and privacy-by-design principles; includes existing features list and image requirements.
